meta.description: Optimize warehouse rental contracts to minimize total rental fees over 4 months.

sets.name: MONTHS
sets.description: Months for which warehouse space is required.

sets.name: PERIODS
sets.description: Possible contract rental periods in months.

params.name: required_area
params.description: Required warehouse area for each month in m^2.

params.name: rental_fee
params.description: Rental fee per m^2 for each contract period.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Area in m^2 rented with a contract starting in a given month for a given period.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(x[m][p] * rental_fee[p] for m in MONTHS for p in PERIODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total rental cost over all months and contract periods.

constraints.name: satisfy_demand_month_1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['1'][p] for p in PERIODS if int(p) <= 1)
constraints.description: Ensure the required area is rented for month 1.

constraints.name: satisfy_demand_month_2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['1'][p] for p in PERIODS if int(p) >= 2) + sum(x['2'][p] for p in PERIODS if int(p) <= 2)
constraints.description: Ensure the required area is rented for month 2.

constraints.name: satisfy_demand_month_3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['1'][p] for p in PERIODS if int(p) >= 3) + sum(x['2'][p] for p in PERIODS if int(p) >= 2) + sum(x['3'][p] for p in PERIODS if int(p) <= 3)
constraints.description: Ensure the required area is rented for month 3.

constraints.name: satisfy_demand_month_4
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['1'][p] for p in PERIODS if int(p) >= 4) + sum(x['2'][p] for p in PERIODS if int(p) >= 3) + sum(x['3'][p] for p in PERIODS if int(p) >= 2) + sum(x['4'][p] for p in PERIODS if int(p) <= 4)
constraints.description: Ensure the required area is rented for month 4.
